knimeNode.name: Least Confident Scorer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Assigns a score based on the overall lowest certainty.

fullDescription.intro: Basic Uncertainty Sampling Scorer, the score is calculated as 1 minus the highest class probability for the row. Notice: This method is very sensitive to noise!
fullDescription.option: Select all columns that are part of the class probability distribution.

ports.inPort: Unlabeled data with class probability distribution.

outPort.name: Input Data with Least Confident Score

ports.outPort: Input data with least confident score
